about:
I am a technically driven Software Engineering Team Lead with a passion for learning and implementing new technologies. With a strong academic foundation in Computer Science and over 7 years of experience in software development, project leadership, and team management, I specialize in delivering scalable and efficient software solutions. My expertise spans various programming languages, frameworks, and modern technologies, with a focus on software development, cloud engineering, DevOps, and machine learning. 


 I believe that a good software engineer is someone who can quickly learn new technologies and deliver highquality results, regardless of the tools at hand. Dedicated to continuous learning and innovation, I lead crossfunctional teams to achieve impactful outcomes
